Package index

Jamsession Path Options

Define the central file paths used for each stored type

jamsession_paths()
jamsession file paths

Storing and Loading Jamsession sessions

Management of R sessions

grep_jamsessions()
Search for saved R sessions
load_jamsession()
load an R session
save_jamsession()
save an R session
show_session_versions()
show versions saved for a session

Storing and loading R objects

Store and reload R objects in a central location, to use across R sessions

grep_objects()
search for saved R objects
load_object()
load R object by name
save_object()
save R object to a central location

Refreshing functions in a virtual package

Refresh R functions as a virtual package

grep_functions()
search for saved R functions
list_functions_exports()
List functions file exports
refresh_functions()
Load or refresh R file functions as a temporary package

Internal functions

Internal functions not intended for common use by R users.

clean_jamsession_name()
Clean jamsession name prior to saving an output file
fileInfo()
file information in data.frame format
list_functions()
list available R functions for jamsession
list_jamsessions()
List saved R sessions
list_objects()
list saved R objects
print_pkg_description()
Print package DESCRIPTION
